Adds SASS linter to Webpack npm scripts, therapist.
Uses stylelint-config-standard, with some additional rule changes (see .stylelintrc)
Uses stylelint-order to force property order (see .stylelintrc) - basic order is [@import/include/extend, custom properties, $variables, styles, nested rules, remaining @'s (media queries etc)]
Uses stylelint-order to enforce alphabetical property order
If stylelint fails when building for production, an error is thrown and the build is halted.

Currently, the linter only runs when starting up webpack - it seems watching doesn't work for stylelint. This should be fine, though not so ideal.
@rehandalal @mythmon ℝ?
Edit: there are a ton of stylelint rules - if there's anything that we should include, just comment it here and I'll add it

title: Add stylelint
body:
- Adds SASS linter to ~~Webpack~~ npm scripts, therapist.
- Uses [stylelint-config-standard](https://github.com/stylelint/stylelint-config-standard), with some additional rule changes (see `.stylelintrc`)
- Uses [stylelint-order](https://github.com/hudochenkov/stylelint-order) to force property order (see `.stylelintrc`) - basic order is `[@import/include/extend, custom properties, $variables, styles, nested rules, remaining @'s (media queries etc)]`
- Uses stylelint-order to enforce alphabetical property order
- If stylelint fails when building for production, an error is thrown and the build is halted.

Currently, the linter only runs when starting up webpack - it seems watching doesn't work for stylelint. This should be fine, though not so ideal.

@rehandalal @mythmon ℝ?

Edit: there are a ton of [stylelint rules](http://stylelint.io/user-guide/rules/) - if there's anything that we should include, just comment it here and I'll add it
